title: Upvote if you find Yasuo mildly irritating
body:
https://alavon365.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/peer-pressure.jpg

Edit: Holy upvotes Batman!
Edit 2: The post is so old that the original image was removed. I managed to save it and reposted it. Still one of the top posts is M&G history thanks you guys! :D

replies.body: +1 {{champion:157}} windwalled my {{champion:113}} ultimate. I'm now posting from orbit because it tilted me off the face of the planet.

> +1 {{champion:157}} windwalled my {{champion:113}} ultimate. I'm now posting from orbit because it tilted me off the face of the planet.

He had the skill to react fast enough, o u t p l a y e d.

EDIT: it is balanced please don't nerf Yasuo ;_;

The one that really tilts me is when he windwalls in the wrong direction, but because the ability sweeps out from his model it still blocks shit coming from the other way. I want his windwall to work like Anivia wall and require smart, interrupting placement.
WE ALL AGREE TELL THAT TO THE BALANCE TEAM
They don't listen to me anymore, ever since I asked for {{champion:105}} buffs
upvote for fizz buffs {{champion:105}}
Rework coming soon!!!

As a fellow Fizz main (hey I'm even in a Fizz club on NA), I can say that the changes are pretty fun. His wave-shoving ability is way better with the new W, so you can be a bit more of a threat while your opponent roams. You have to max W now I think, so you don't get access to the better cooldown and spammability of the E until later (level13). 

Getting used to holding W until the mark is cooked is really tricky, because you're probably in the habit of pressing Q-W at the same time or E-then W as you land. Now you just hold the W for the auto-reset and cooked mark damage. 

The other nice thing is that, since you aren't maxing E as your primary damage tool, you don't have any mana issues. This means a lichbane rush is a little bit easier to do. Lichbane + cooked level 5 W is a surprisingly big chunk of burst. Add protobelt for that sweet bonus mobility and it's pretty solid.
Are you the guy who got a job at Riot as analyst and said you'll prove Riot Games mathematically that Yasuo is overloaded? If so i hate you. <3 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
lol nope that's not me
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} Okay.

hope we will be used to it
thx for your tips!
As a Yasuo main, fix that and make his Windwall last a little shorter (4 seconds is a bit long) and he will be fine again.

Yeah and it needs to be placed at the targeted area. U have no idea how many times I've thrown a projectile at a yas and its literally right on his butt, behind where the wind wall would be, but then he throws that thing out and bam. ;__;
how is this not a bug????

Enough of these, we get it, the boards don't like Yasuo, don't need to make 500 upvote farming threads about it. If you do this, you'll just piss Yasuo mains even more and they'll be even more toxic.

#Memes and Games

I don't know how you got "Gameplay" out of that.
The point still stands. Its getting old. The fact that its becoming a meme is even sadder
Well, if you have a problem with it, you can always go to Gameplay and whine about it there. That's what that part of the boards is for, right?

> [{quoted}](name=AbsorbantTNT,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=gPv32oLg,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-01T22:32:47.448+0000)
>
> Well, if you have a problem with it, you can always go to Gameplay and whine about it there. That's what that part of the boards is for, right?

No, in gameplay you whine about things related to gameplay, like yasuo.
You want to whine about a meme, you need to do it in memes and games.

Do people regularly whine about memes?
Seems kind of redundant.

Its turning into a meta-meme
 
Where you meme about meming about hating yasuo

Honestly its less stupid than other memes.

http://i.imgur.com/Divi9yo.png?1
Slowly losing sanity
Maybe we should break the meta and write anti Galio memes

Milhouse is not a meme
am i doing this meme thing right
Eh I haven't said anything about gameplay. All I'm saying is the Yasuo hate is ridiculous at the moment. Where did you get the gameplay?
The idea he's getting at is that Yasuo is always complained about in Gameplay boards; that, and that's where people usually complain about things. M&G is for NOT taking things seriously.

I've said that mostly because absorbant seems to have the habit to bring nonsense to discussion sometimes, when I've said Azir and Kalista were the most broken champions in the game, he came in saying "so ivern is the duke because he has a low winrate?" When I've never talked about winrate on the thread. I know MG are for jokes, but clearly this is just trying to farm upvotes.

I created this post to satirically portray the dozens of "Upvote if you hate Yasuo" posts in the gameplay boards. I think that fact that you said that my post is similar to other posts on the section when there were 0 posts even pertaining to Yasuo on M&G when I posted it is funnier then the actual post I created. I also love how you also try to discredit AbsorbantTNT by mentioning an argument from a completely different section of the boards like it's actually relevant.

If you want to discuss the originality of the post you can put that in the Miscellaneous section where you will find like minded individuals to discuss it with.
